product_name: The North Face Plushee Fleece Bunting - Infants'
long_description: The North Face Plushee fleece bunting offers babies soft and warm coverage from fuzzy head to tiny toe. Sherpa fleece fabric is toasty warm and comfortable; taffeta layer on chest makes spills and spit-ups easy to clean. Dual side zips extend from the neck to the leg for easy dressing and undressing. The North Face Plushee fleece bunting features a full hood, elastic binding at the cuffs and fold-over cuffs at the feet to provide additional protection in cold weather.
short_description: The North Face Plushee fleece bunting offers babies soft and warm coverage from fuzzy head to tiny toe.
subcategory: Kids' Snowsuits, Rain Suits And Buntings
